title: The Second Punic War
description: Follow Hannibal's legendary campaign against Rome through eight epic battles, from crossing the Rhône to the final confrontation at Zama. Master Carthaginian tactics and challenge the might of Rome.

missions.intro_text: 218 BC: Hannibal's army reaches the Rhône River. Roman forces block the crossing. Secure the river crossing and defeat the Roman advance guard to continue the march toward Italy.
missions.outro_text: The Rhône is crossed! Your army marches onward, one step closer to Rome. The Republic now knows that Hannibal cannot be stopped by rivers alone.

missions.intro_text: 218 BC: First engagement on Italian soil. Consul Publius Scipio's cavalry meets Hannibal's forces at the Ticino River. Use your superior cavalry to outmaneuver the Romans.
missions.outro_text: Victory! The Roman consul is wounded and retreats. Your cavalry has proven its superiority. Rome begins to fear the Carthaginian threat.

missions.intro_text: 218 BC, Winter: The Trebia River runs cold. Consul Sempronius leads a full Roman army. Lure the enemy into the freezing waters, then strike from ambush with your concealed forces.
missions.outro_text: A crushing victory! The Roman army is shattered in the frozen river. Your ambush tactics have proven devastating. Rome's confidence wavers.

missions.intro_text: 217 BC: Consul Flaminius pursues your army along Lake Trasimene. The morning mist conceals your trap. Execute the perfect ambush and annihilate the Roman legion.
missions.outro_text: Complete destruction! Flaminius is dead, his army annihilated in the greatest ambush in history. Rome appoints a dictator in desperation.

missions.intro_text: 216 BC: The decisive moment. Rome's largest army ever assembled stands before you at Cannae. Execute the double envelopment - your masterpiece of tactical warfare.
missions.outro_text: Immortal victory! The Roman army is encircled and destroyed. 50,000 Romans lie dead. Your name will echo through history as the greatest tactical commander.

missions.intro_text: 215-212 BC: Control the rich region of Campania. Defend against Roman counterattacks while maintaining your army's strength. Hold the strategic cities and villages.
missions.outro_text: Campania secured! Your army has resupplied and allies have joined your cause. But Rome refuses to surrender, and the war grinds on.

missions.intro_text: 218 BC (Flashback): Before Italy, before the victories - the impossible crossing. Lead your army through the snow-covered Alps. Survive nature's fury and hostile mountain tribes.
missions.outro_text: Against all odds, you have crossed the Alps! Though you've lost many men and elephants, you have achieved the impossible. Italy lies before you.

missions.intro_text: 202 BC: Called back to Africa, you face Scipio Africanus - Rome's answer to your tactics. The final confrontation. Can you overcome Rome's best general?
missions.outro_text: The war ends. Whether in victory or honorable defeat, Hannibal's campaign has changed warfare forever. Rome has survived its greatest test, but will never forget Hannibal's genius.
